short_summary: Construction of One and Two Dwelling Buildings
description: Construction contract to build a house on Lot 6, Block 5 in Resolute Bay, Nunavut.
full_summary:
# Reconstruct House on Lot 6 Block 5 in Resolute Bay, Nunavut

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Contract Reference Number:** PW-23-01022130

**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-22-0209/A

**Publication Date:** January 19, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** March 2, 2023 at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time

**Procurement Category:** Construction

## Description

Parks Canada invites Inuit businesses to submit proposals for the reconstruction of a house on Lot 6 Block 5 in Resolute Bay, Nunavut. This project is subject to the Nunavut Land Claims Agreement under the Treasury Board Directive on Government Contracts, Including Real Property Leases, in the Nunavut Settlement Area. Only businesses listed on the Inuit Firm Registry are eligible to submit bids.

## Bidding Requirements

Bidders must submit their proposals via email or fax to the Contracting Authority. Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted. The only acceptable email address for responses to bid solicitations is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca. Bids submitted by email directly to the Contracting Authority or to any email address other than the approved one will not be considered.

## Project Details

The work comprises the provision of all construction, labour and materials, demolition, equipment, and temporary facilities required to complete the house renovation located in Resolute Bay, NU, in conformance with the Contract Documents. The estimated value of the project is between $1,000,001 and $5,000,000, excluding taxes.

## Timeline

The expected completion date for the project is March 31, 2027.

## Additional Information

A bidders’ conference will be held via teleconference on January 31, 2023, at 1:00 PM Eastern Standard Time. Bidders are encouraged to attend or send a representative to address any questions and concerns regarding the solicitation.

Contract documents can be obtained from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca). Late submissions will not be considered.

## Contact Information

For further information or to request clarification, please contact:

* Cloë Pelland-Tessier
* Contracting Authority
* Phone: 418-928-7252
* Email: [cloe.pell
